TopicTitle: Im using TACLS, EL, and MKS/OKS in ksp 1.2. Should i set up a launching base on minimus and go to duna then? why or why not

Articles.Content: What should i do? List of mods: Airpark, EL, MKS/OKS, TACLS,and planning on getting karbonite, karbonite+ and b9 HX (for motherships) Once the 1.2 versions come out.
